Choose the CORRECT option regarding the representative behavior exhibited by Curve P and Curve Q  
 
(A) Curve P represents loose sand and normally consolidated clay, while Curve Q represents dense sand    
and overconsolidated clay 
 
(B) Curve P represents dense sand and normally consolidated clay, while Curve Q represents loose sand    
and overconsolidated clay 
 
(C) Curve P represents loose sand and overconsolidated clay clay, while Curve Q represents dense sand    
and normally consolidated 
 
 
(D) Curve P represents dense sand and overconsolidated clay, while Curve Q represents loose sand and 
normally consolidated clay. 
Ans. 
D
